name: VALZ
storyline:
Follow the story of Tole and his band in their quest to bring back the lost harmony to their homeland.

"City of Lagu, once known as the capital of harmony, has now fallen into deep slumber of silence. Lost is the power of Garputala, the holy instrument that keeps sound pure and intact.

The dark side of the sound took over, infecting instruments of music, silences them and turns them into monsters of discord. Monsters that can only be defeated by those of pure harmony."
summary: Valz is a story driven rhythm RPG that revolves around music with a beautiful, hand¬-painted motion comic story¬telling. The game boasts RPG elements, such as deep story and party customization, and a unique rhythm-based mechanics in its combat system.
